name: Axis Game Factory - dream, build, create and play!
blurb: A cutting-edge open world toolset for players to create, design, build and share games: by industry veteran Matt McDonald's Heavy Water

rewards.reward: No Reward
You want to support Axis Game Factory, and we want to THANK YOU for your support!

FACTORY SUPPORTER

We thank you for your pledge!  Everyone at Heavy Water appreciates your support!!  Every backer for this level or more will receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE on the Axis Game Factory Forums.  We invite you to join and participate on our forums where you get a chance to discuss the toolset, features, and offer suggestions as well as interact with Matt McDonald and his development team.
Pledge will receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Factory Supporter” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

ENTRY-LEVEL FACTORY WORKER
The early bird gets the proverbial worm!
The STARTER PAK includes themed building assets, terrain, props, weapons, controllable characters, NPCs, enemies, sound effects, and character voice over selections.  The STARTER PAK also expands the toolset features to Deluxe Mode, which allows for unlimited scene seaming, game share mode, and multiple camera control options.
This pledge will receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK!  Pledge will also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an “Entry-Level Factory Worker” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

ENTRY-LEVEL FACTORY WORKER\r\nThe STARTER PAK includes themed building assets, terrain, props, weapons, controllable characters, NPCs, enemies, sound effects, and character voice over selections.  The STARTER PAK also expands the toolset features to Deluxe Mode, which allows for unlimited scene seaming, game share mode, and multiple camera control options.\r\nThis pledge will receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK! Pledge will also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an \u201cEntry-Level Factory Worker\u201d on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

ASSEMBLY LINE WORKER 
Previous reward tier + LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK!

The LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK comes with a selection of "ONE TIME ONLY HEROES" that you can control in any game that you make. These HEROES will never be released outside of the KickStarter Campaign so make sure you get them here!

This pledge will receive ONE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY of the AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK and LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK!  Pledge will also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an “Assembly Line Worker” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

FACTORY TECHNICIAN 
Previous reward tier + EXPANDED ASSET PAK!

The EXPANDED ASSET PAK contains more building assets, terrain types, props, weapons, NPCs, enemies, sound effects, and voice over selections as an extension to the STARTER PAK of your choice. 

This pledge will receive ONE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY of the AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, EXPANDED ASSET PAK, and LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK! Pledge will also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Factory Technician” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

QUALITY CONTROL INSPECTOR
Previous reward tier + an ASTMOS-PAK + BETA ACCESS to the AXIS GAME FACTORY software!

The ATMOS-PAK gives you more atmospheres to give your scenes different looks and feels. BETA Access grants you the ability to help us test AXIS GAME FACTORY software well before its release. Track bugs and submit feature requests straight to the development team. Get the tool early and have your levels go live for the world when AXIS GAME FACTORY launches. 

This pledge will receive BETA access tied to your forum account, ONE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY of the AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, EXPANDED ASSET PAK, LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, and ATMOS-PAK! Pledge will also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Quality Control Inspector” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

NIGHTSHIFT SUPERVISOR
Previous reward tier + a 2nd set of AXIS GAME FACTORY CONTENT for a friend!

You’ve worked nights to pay for a 2nd set of content for a special friend. Only you will have BETA Access to AXIS GAME FACTORY linked to your forum membership. 
This pledge will receive TWO copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Nightshift Supervisor” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

SHIFT SUPERVISOR
Previous reward tier + a limited edition AXIS GAME FACTORY T-SHIRT!

This tier receives all the benefits of the Nightshift Supervisor position plus a limited edition Uniform [T-SHIRT]. These shirts will only be printed once for those first becoming a Shift Supervisor with AXIS GAME FACTORY. 
This pledge will receive one limited edition AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and TWO copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Shift Supervisor” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

SHIFT SUPERVISOR
NIGHTSHIFT SUPERVISOR reward tier + an AXIS GAME FACTORY T-SHIRT!

This tier receives all the benefits of the Nightshift Supervisor position plus a spiffy new AXIS GAME FACTORY Uniform [T-SHIRT].

This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and TWO copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Shift Supervisor” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

PRODUCT INSPECTION MANAGER\r\nYou have put in your time at the Factory and now you need access to everything... By popular demand... This pak includes ONE of EVERYTHING...  This pledge will receive ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and ONE copy of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE SFX+ PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, ONE MEGA TERRAIN PAK, ONE MEGA WEAPONS PAK and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a \u201cProduct Inspection Manager\u201d on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

FOREMAN
Previous reward tier + AERIAL VEHICLES PAK!
This tier receives the benefits of the Shift Supervisor plus the exciting AERIAL VEHICLES PAK! This PAK includes an array of flying vehicles for various themes; if you like aerial combat, you don't want to miss this PAK. You also get a copy of this for a friend!
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and TWO copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Foreman” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

SENIOR PRODUCT INSPECTION MANAGER\r\nThis tier gives you everything that a "Product Inspection Manager" would receive - with ALL THREE STARTER-PAK LAUNCH THEMES... Because you are a fan of every genre, we won't hold you back!  You have put in your time at the Factory and now you need access to everything... By popular demand... This pak includes ONE of EVERYTHING...  This pledge will receive ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and ONE copy of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ALL THREE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAKS, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE SFX+ PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, ONE MEGA TERRAIN PAK, ONE MEGA WEAPONS PAK and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a \u201cProduct Inspection Manager\u201d on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

QUALITY CONTROL MANAGER
Previous reward tier + SFX PLUS PACK + ALPHA ACCESS!
Get even more Sound Effects for your game with the SFX+ PACK. You also get a second copy of the SFX+ PACK for a friend. ALPHA Access grants you the ability to help us test AXIS GAME FACTORY software well before its release. Track bugs and submit feature requests straight to the development team. Get the tool early and have your levels go live for the world when AXIS GAME FACTORY launches.
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and TWO copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE SFX+ PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Quality Control Manager” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGER
Previous reward tier DOUBLED!
You’ve got a real people-person personality and you just can’t-not include your closest friends. This tier gives you all previous AXIS GAME FACTORY rewards plus the ability to gift the same to 3 of your friends. You AXIS GAME FACTORY forum login will be given ALPHA and BETA ACCESS.
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and FOUR copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE SFX+ PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an “HR  Manager” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

PRO-PAK MASTER ENGINEER  This is what you all have been asking for... a "Pro" version of the access game factory!  Not only will you have the keys to the factory, you will have early access to the PRO PAK TWO MONTHS prior to anyone else and we are limiting this to the first 500!  The Pro Pak will afford users a set of Unity extensions that will allow the user the ability to bring assets into and out of the Axis Game Factory.  From Unity, the user will be able to add any additional code features they like and create their own .exe files and monetize on their game creations as they wish, with no additional licensing fees due to Axis Game Factory.  (*Unity license is not included, Photon Cloud Multiplayer/Networking software must be obtained separately by the user; the Pro Pak will support Unity 4.0 and greater).  This tier gives you everything that a "Senior Product Inspection Manager" would receive - with ALL THREE STARTER-PAK LAUNCH THEMES...  This pak includes ONE of EVERYTHING... This pledge will receive ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and ONE copy of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ALL THREE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAKS, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE SFX+ PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, ONE MEGA TERRAIN PAK, ONE MEGA WEAPONS PAK and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a \u201cMaster Engineer\u201d on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

MANUFACTURING ENGINEER
Previous reward tier + MEGA WEAPONS PAK!
If you like to blow things up, then this PAK is for you! The MEGA WEAPONS PAK comes loaded with an array of weapons that allow for hand to hand combat and military assaults, as well as ground and aerial vehicle attachments. You will receive four virtual copies of the MEGA WEAPONS PAK for you and 3 friends!
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and FOUR copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PAK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PAK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PAK, ONE ATMOS-PAK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PAK, ONE MEGA WEAPONS PAK, and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Manufacturing Engineer” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

ASSISTANT PLANT MANAGER
Previous reward tier + MEGA TERRAIN PACK for you and 5 friends!
This tier will give you and 5 friends all rewards in the previous tier plus the MEGA TERRAIN PACK. This expands on terrain types, commercial flooring, various topography and foliage so you will never go wanting when designing the landscape of your game. 
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and SIX copies of the following: DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY STARTER PACK, ONE EXPANDED ASSET PACK, ONE LIMITED EDITION HERO PACK, ONE ATMOS-PACK, ONE AERIAL VEHICLES PACK, ONE MEGA WEAPONS PAK, ONE MEGA TERRAIN PACK, and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an “Assistant Plant Manager” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

PLANT MANAGER
Previous reward tier + COMPLETE LAUNCH CONTENT for you and 5 friends!
This tier affords you and 9 of your closest friends all content being released on Day 1 for AXIS GAME FACTORY. Get a head start by having all the tools and content to make really superior scenes and gameplay.
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt and TEN copies of the following: ALL DAY 1 CONTENT and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Plant Manager” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

EXECUTIVE
Previous reward tier + DESIGN A HERO with the DEVELOPER!
You’re a trusted senior executive for AXIS GAME FACTORY and you get your choice of HERO to fight for you when the product is released!  Design a HERO with the developer, receive the HERO at launch and have the ability to gift 100 copies of said HERO to your closest friends! You will also receive a 12” Model of the HERO in a material of your choosing [material choices will be offered with the survey once the KickStarter is successfully funded].
This pledge will receive one AXIS GAME FACTORY T-shirt, a 12” physical model of your Hero, 101 DIGITAL COPIES OF YOUR HERO, and TEN copies of the following: ALL DAY 1 CONTENT and ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you an “Executive” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.

CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD

PRE-ALPHA + ALPHA + BETA + LIFETIME SUPPLY OF AGF ASSETS for you and 9 FRIENDS!
Get early access to all builds of AXIS GAME FACTORY software, even before ALPHA release. Everything that is released under the AXIS GAME FACTORY banner from launch into eternity will be yours for free, as well as 9 people of your choosing. 
This pledge will receive TEN copies of the following: ONE AXIS GAME FACTORY T-SHIRT, A LIFETIME SUPPLY TICKET, and PRE-ALPHA, ALPHA and BETA Access tied to your forum account with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE naming you a “Chairman of the Board” on all Axis Game Factory Forums.
